dependencies: OS packages installed in image: git, ansible (Dockerfile)

Ansible playbook provisions: openjdk-17-jdk-headless, dotnet-sdk-7.0, aspnetcore-runtime-7.0, dotnet-runtime-7.0, lynx, maven, postgresql, vscode (Infrastructure/conf_mgmt_ansible/playbooks/01-image-build-and-push.yml)
Ansible playbook provisions: docker-ce, awscli v2 (Infrastructure/conf_mgmt_ansible/playbooks/02-image-pull-and-deploy.yml)

GitHub Actions uses: actions/checkout@v3, vitr/actions-build-and-upload-to-ecs@master, aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v1, aws-actions/amazon-ecr-login@v1, hashicorp/setup-terraform@v2, jakejarvis/s3-sync-action@master, unfor19/install-aws-cli-action@v1 (.github/workflows/*.yml)
deployment_relevant_files: Infrastructure/conf_terraform/FILE (appears to be a binary zip containing tfplan/tfstate/.terraform.lock.hcl; not editable .tf sources)
architectural_resources: Web application: static site served by Apache httpd in a Docker container
Container image registry: Amazon ECR (repo main-applications-registry referenced in .github/workflows/cicd.yml and scripts)
CI/CD: GitHub Actions pipelines for build/push, test-run, and infra deploy/destroy (.github/workflows/*.yml)
Compute: AWS EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling Group (scripts reference ASG name demo-asg-instance-1; README describes ASG of 2 instances)
Networking: VPC, subnet, internet gateway, route table, security groups, load balancer (described in README.md)
Database: AWS RDS MySQL (described in README.md; security group ingress example for port 3306)
Object storage: AWS S3 bucket for Terraform state (README.md and workflows reference terraform-resources-test)
Provisioning/config management: Ansible playbooks executed during image build and deployment
Secrets/credentials: GitHub Actions secrets for AWS keys and PEM key; SSH used to run remote scripts on EC2 (Infrastructure/scripts/getAsgMachinesIps.sh)
